CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 1 reads: "All-Night Gospel Sing For Drafts Fund-...crowd of about 1,500 persons attending the all-night gospel sing which began Friday at 10p.m. at Calvary Baptist Church, Wylie Ave., Pittsburgh. The church, pastored by the Re. James A. Cox, donated its services. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Congregation of men, and women, three wearing light colored dresses clapping in first pew, in Calvary Baptist Church for All Night Gospel Sing for the Charles "Buggsy" Drafts Fund
